doc.title: Lords of Fuzz
doc.plot: Unknown but talented Denver band, Lords of Fuzz, goes on their first tour in the American south and southwest. What is like to go on a rock and roll tour in a real tour bus when no one knows who you are? Where do you play, who watches you, what are the challenges? Humorous look at what its like when a band of four interesting guys get a very small glimpse at fame, their American Dream, in a country where that dream is not attainable any longer for many Americans.
